turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Hey!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Han, don't. It'll be all right.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Somehow, I got the feeling that didn't help us very much.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Threepio, tell them if they don't do as you wish, you'll become angry and use your magic.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Someone who loves you.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Leia!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I gotta get you out of here.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I don't know. All I can see is a lot of blowing sand!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: That's all any of us can see.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Hey, are you awake?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Yeah, I just got a funny feeling. Like I'm not gonna see her again.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Now we find out if that code is worth the price we paid.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: It'll work. It'll work.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Shall we try and go around?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: It'll take time. This whole party'll be for nothing if they see us.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: What's going on?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I don't know.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Ahhh...

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Hold me.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: The main entrance to the control bunker's on the far side of that landing platform. This isn't gonna be easy.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Hey, don't worry. Chewie and me got into a lot of places more heavily guarded than this.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Han! Hurry! The fleet will be here any moment.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Charges!  Come on, come on!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: The code's changed. We need Artoo!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Here's the terminal.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I'm sure Luke wasn't on that thing when it blew.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: He wasn't. I can feel it.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: You love him, don't you?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: All right. I understand. Fine. When he comes back, I won't get in the way.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Han! Chewie?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Lando!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Lando, grab it!

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Lower it!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I'm trying!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Chewie! Chewie, give me the gun. Don't move, Lando.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: No, wait! I thought you were blind!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: It's all right. Trust me. Don't move.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: All right! A little higher! Just a little higher!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Guess I owe you some thanks, too, Lando.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Figured if I left you frozen like that you'd just give me bad luck the rest of my life, so I might as well get you unfrozen sooner or later.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Well, look at you, a general, huh?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Oh, well, someone must have told them about my little maneuver at the battle of Taanab.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Look. I want you to take her. I mean it. Take her. You need all the help you can get. She's the fastest ship in the fleet.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: All right, old buddy. You know, I know what she means to you. I'll take good care of her. She-she won't get a scratch. All right?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Good luck.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: You, too.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Oh, dear. His High Exaltedness, the great Jabba the Hutt, has decreed that you are to be terminated immediately.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Good, I hate long waits.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: You will therefore be taken to the Dune Sea and cast into the pit of Carkoon, the nesting place of the all-powerful Sarlacc.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: In his belly, you will find a new definition of pain and suffering, as you are slowly digested over a thousand years.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: On second thought, let's pass on that, huh?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Here we go again.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: All right, hang on.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: What are you telling them?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Hello, I think... I could be mistaken. They're using a very primitive dialect.  But I do believe they think I am some sort of god.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Well, why don't you use your divine influence and get us out of this?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: I beg your pardon, General Solo, but that just wouldn't be proper.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Proper?!

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: It's against my programming to impersonate a deity.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: What did he say?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: I'm rather embarrassed, General Solo, but it appears you are to be the main course at a banquet in my honor.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: We're coming!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Come on! Come on!

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Oh, Artoo, hurry!

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: My goodness! Artoo, why did you have to be so brave?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Well, I suppose I could hotwire this thing.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Oh, Princess Leia, are you all right?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Let's see.

turns.speaker: JERJERROD
turns.text: Lord Vader, this is an unexpected pleasure. We're honored by your presence.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: You may dispense with the pleasantries, Commander. I'm here to put you back on schedule.

turns.speaker: JERJERROD
turns.text: I assure you, Lord Vader, my men are working as fast as they can.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Perhaps I can find new ways to motivate them.

turns.speaker: JERJERROD
turns.text: I tell you, this station will be operational as planned.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: The Emperor does not share your optimistic appraisal of the situation.

turns.speaker: JERJERROD
turns.text: But he asks the impossible. I need more men.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Then perhaps you can tell him when he arrives.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: That is correct, Commander. And he is most displeased with your apparent lack of progress.

turns.speaker: JERJERROD
turns.text: We shall double our efforts.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: I hope so, Commander, for your sake. The Emperor is not as forgiving as I am.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: All wings report in.

turns.speaker: WEDGE
turns.text: Red Leader standing by.

turns.speaker: WEDGE
turns.text: Good shot, Red Two.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Now...come on, Han, old buddy. Don't let me down.

turns.speaker: WEDGE
turns.text: I'm going in.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Here goes nothing.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Now lock onto the strongest power source. It should be the power generator.

turns.speaker: WEDGE
turns.text: Form up. And stay alert. We could run out of space real fast.

turns.speaker: WEDGE
turns.text: There it is!

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: All right, Wedge. Go for the power regulator on the north tower.

turns.speaker: WEDGE
turns.text: Copy, Gold Leader. I'm already on my way out.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Ugh!

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Ohhh, I can't bear to watch.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Oh!

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Your Royal Highness.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What's he saying?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: He says there's a secret entrance on the other side of the ridge.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Oh! Oh, my. Uh, Princess Leia!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Quiet.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: I'm afraid our furry companion has gone and done something rather rash.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Oh, no.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Over there! Two more of them!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I see them. Wait, Leia!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Leia... do you remember your mother? Your real mother?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Just a little bit. She died when I was very young.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: What do you remember?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Just...images, really. Feelings.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Tell me.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: She was very beautiful. Kind, but...sad.  Why are you asking me all this?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I have no memory of my mother. I never knew her.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Luke, tell me. What's troubling you?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Vader is here...now, on this moon.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: He's my father.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Your father?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: There's more. It won't be easy for you to hear it, but you must. If I don't make it back, you're the only hope for the Alliance.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Luke, don't talk that way. You have a power I--I don't understand and could never have.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: You're wrong, Leia. You have that power too. In time you'll learn to use it as I have. The Force is strong in my family. My father has it...I have it...and...my sister has it.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Yes. It's you Leia.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I know. Somehow...I've always known.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Then you know why I have to face him.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: No! Luke, run away, far away. If he can feel your presence, then leave this place. I wish I could go with you.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: No, you don't. You've always been strong.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: But, why must you confront him?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Because...there is good in him. I've felt it. He won't turn me over to the Emperor. I can save him. I can turn him back to the good side. I have to try.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: The Emperor has been expecting you.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I know, father.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: So, you have accepted the truth.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Come with me.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Obi-Wan once thought as you do.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: You don't know the power of the dark side. I must obey my master.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I will not turn...and you'll be forced to kill me.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: If that is your destiny.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Search your feelings, father. You can't do this. I feel the conflict within you. Let go of your hate.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: It is too late for me, son. The Emperor will show you the true nature of the Force. He is your master now.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Obi-Wan has taught you well.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I will not fight you, father.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Your thoughts betray you, father. I feel the good in you...the conflict.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: There is no conflict.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: You couldn't bring yourself to kill me before, and I don't believe you'll destroy me now.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: You underestimate the power of the dark side. If you will not fight, then you will meet your destiny.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: You cannot hide forever, Luke.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I will not fight you.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Give yourself to the dark side. It is the only way you can save your friends. Yes, your thoughts betray you. Your feelings for them are strong. Especially for...

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Sister! So...you have a twin sister. Your feelings have now betrayed her, too. Obi-Wan was wise to hide her from me. Now his failure is complete. If you will not turn to the dark side, then perhaps she will.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Never-r-r!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Master Yoda, you can't die.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Strong am I with the Force... but not that strong! Twilight is upon me and soon night must fall. That is the way of things... the way of the Force.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: But I need your help. I've come back to complete the training.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: No more training do you require. Already know you that which you need.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Yoda, I must know.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Your father he is.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Told you, did he?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Unexpected this is, and unfortunate...

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Unfortunate that I know the truth?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Well, I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Remember, a Jedi's strength flows from the Force.  But beware.  Anger, fear, aggression. The dark side are they.  Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny.

turns.speaker: NINEDENINE
turns.text: Ah, good. New acquisitions. You are a protocol droid, are you not?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: I am See-Threepio, human-cy...

turns.speaker: NINEDENINE
turns.text: Yes or no will do.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Oh. Well, yes.

turns.speaker: NINEDENINE
turns.text: How many languages do you speak?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, and can readily...

turns.speaker: NINEDENINE
turns.text: Splendid! We have been without an interpreter since our master got angry with our last protocol droid and disintegrated him.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Disintegrated?

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Do you have any tattoos Brad.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Certainly not!

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Oh well.  How about you.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: You!

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: I'm afraid so, Brad.  But wasn't it nice?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Why you - what have you done with Janet?

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Nothing.  Why do you think I should?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: You tricked me.  I wouldn't have - I've never - never.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: I know, but it wasn't all bad was it? I think you found it quite pleasurable.  Oh so soft.  So sensual.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Ahhh - no - stop - I mean Janet.  Janet.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Shush.  Janet's probably asleep by now. Do you want her to see you like this?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Like this.  Like how?  It's your fault - you're to blame.  I thought it was the real thing.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Oh come on, Brad, admit it.  It was enjoyable, wasn't it?  There's no crime in giving yourself over to pleasure.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: You promise you won't tell?

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: On my mother's grave.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: I see.  So this wasn't simply a chance meeting.  You came here with a purpose.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I told you, my car broke down.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I was telling the truth.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: I know what you told me, Brad. But this Dr Everett Scott.  His name is not unknown to me.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: He was a Science Teacher at Denton High.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: And now he works for your Government, doesn't he, Brad?  He's attached to the Bureau of Investigation of that which you call U.F.O's.  Isn't he, Brad?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: He might be.  I don't know.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Hmmmm.  He'll be in the Zen Room.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Janet!

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Rocky!

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: It's as if we were glued to the spot.

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: You are - so quake with fear, you tiny fools.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: The future is ours so let's plan it.

turns.speaker: FAMILY
turns.text: Janet.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: So please don't tell me to can it.

turns.speaker: FAMILY
turns.text: Janet.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I've one thing to say and that's Dammit, Janet. I love you.

turns.speaker: FAMILY
turns.text: Janet.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Made me give you the eye And then panic,

turns.speaker: FAMILY
turns.text: Janet

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Everyone knows Betty's a wonderful little cook.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: And Ralph himself will be in line for promotion in a year or so.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Yes Brad.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I've got something to say.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Uh huh.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I really loved the skilful way You beat the other girls To the bride's bouquet.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh Brad.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Oh Janet

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: For you.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh Brad, I'm mad.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Dammit, Janet.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Gosh.  That's the third motorcyclist that's passed us.  They certainly take their lives in their hands.  What with the weather and all.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Yes, Janet.  Life's pretty cheap to that type.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I think we took the wrong fork a few miles back.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh dear!  But then where did the motorcyclists come from?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Hmmm ... Well, I guess we will have to turn back.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: What was that bang?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: We must have a blow-out.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh...

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: You'd better sit here and keep warm while I go for help.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: But where will you go?  We're in the middle of nowhere.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Didn't we pass a castle back down the road a few miles?  Maybe they have a telephone I might use.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: I'm coming with you.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: There's no point both of us getting wet.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: I'm coming with you.  Besides, darling, the owner of the phone might be a beautiful woman and you may never come back.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh, Brad.  Let's go back.  I'm cold and I'm frightened.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Just a moment, Janet.  They may have a telephone.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Yes, the rain has been very heavy.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh Brad, I'm frightened.  What kind of place is this?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Oh, it's probably some kind of hunting lodge for rich weirdos.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh....Say something.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Say!  Do any of you guys know the Madison?

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Brad, please lets get out of here.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: For God's sake keep a grip on yourself Janet.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: But it seems so unhealthy here.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: It's just a..a party Janet.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Well I want to leave.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: We can't go anywhere until I get to a phone.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Then ask the butler - or someone.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Let's wait awhile Janet.  We don't want to interfere with their celebrations.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: This isn't the Junior Chamber of Commerce Brad.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: They're probably foreigners with ways different from our own.  -  They may do some more folk dancing.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Brad - I'm cold, I'm wet, and plain scared.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I'm here, there's nothing to worry about.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Right!

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: We'll just say where we are Then go back to the car We don't want to be any worry.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh Brad.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: It's alright Janet, we'll play along for now and pull out the aces when the time is right.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I'm Brad Majors and this is my fiancee, Janet Vice.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Weiss.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Weiss.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Brad...

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: It's alright Janet.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh Brad - Mmmm - Oh yes, my darling - what if...

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: It's alright Janet.  Everything's going to be alright.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh, I hope so my darling.  But let me switch on the light.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: No, don't do that.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Oh don't be so shy.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: Maybe we could try it this way.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Janet!  Oh!  Yes it's alright.  Janet. Everything's going to be alright.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: I hope so my darling.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: I'm engaged to Brad just the same as Betty Monroe was to Ralph Hapschatt. But Frank's kisses overwhelmed me with an ecstacy I've never dreamt of before. Hot, burning kisses.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: And that's all the time that it takes For a heart to turn to stone The sweeter the wine The harder to make the break You hear something about someone You'd thought you'd known.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: I could see Brad's face before me and my mind screamed No!  But my lips were hungry - too hungry.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: So baby don't cry like there's no tomorrow After the night there's a brand new day. And there'll be no pain And no more sorrow. So wash your face And phone my place It'll be O.K.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: I wanted to be loved completely. My body throbbed excitedly.  Oh Brad, Brad my darling, how could I have done this to you?

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: And that's all the time that it takes For a heart to beat again. So give me a sign That a lover makes You look around The one you've found Is back again.

turns.speaker: JANET
turns.text: If only we hadn't made this journey. If only the car hadn't broken down. If only we were amongst friends or sane persons.

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Uh - oh - Hi!  My name is Brad Majors. And this is my fiancee, Janet Weiss.  I - ah - wondered if you could help us.  Our car has broken down about two miles up the road.  Do you have a phone we might use?

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: You're wet.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Great scott - Scotty - Dr Everett Scott.

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: You know this earth - this person.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: I most certainly do.  He happens to be an old friend of mine.

turns.speaker: BRAD
turns.text: Good God.

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: DR SCOTT
turns.text: Great Heavens, that's a laser.

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: Yes, Dr Scott.  A laser capable of emitting a beam of pure anti-matter.

turns.speaker: DR SCOTT
turns.text: You did right.

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: A decision had to be made.

turns.speaker: DR SCOTT
turns.text: You're OK by me.

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: Dr Scott I'm sorry about your nephew.

turns.speaker: DR SCOTT
turns.text: Yes, well perhaps it was for the best.

turns.speaker: RIFF RAFF
turns.text: You must leave now Dr Scott while it's still possible.  We are about to beam the entire house back to the planet of transexual in the galaxy of Transylvania. Go now.
